title: [Kitten] Kitten work - July/2024
body:
### Work in flight
* [x] QB Mode insertion of the BuildResult fix: https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_workitems/edit/2112247/
* [x] QB Mode fix of telemetry for deprecated code approval: https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_workitems/edit/2134327
* [x] https://stackoverflow.microsoft.com/questions/412569/413111 **Resolution** Provided troubleshooting steps and user moved on :-)
* [x] https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/10293
* [x] https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/10248 (Handled by @AR-May in her Jun work)
* [x] SubstringByAsciiChars 1P issue - https://dev.azure.com/devdiv/DevDiv/_workitems/edit/2080438 - (https://teams.microsoft.com/l/message/19:3212bf033f4c4b5198643a04fa1048fa@thread.skype/1719454504313?tenantId=72f988bf-86f1-41af-91ab-2d7cd011db47&groupId=4ba7372f-2799-4677-89f0-7a1aaea3706c&parentMessageId=1719454504313&teamName=.NET%20Developer%20Experience&channelName=MSBuild&createdTime=1719454504313)
* [x] https://dev.azure.com/devdiv/DevDiv/_workitems/edit/2112261 - Manifest Difference: Microsoft.Build.vsman version=17.11.2.2432701 higher than main
* [x] https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/10320
* [x] VS main insertions fail due to 
DD-VS-PR-DDRIT machine deployemnt issues: https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_build/results?buildId=9818627&view=logs&j=9d09d46c-0ea3-5141-faec-c0507f78f8ad&t=7725c6fc-44f4-546a-53d5-575c06152f42 - **Resolution**: infra team issue, alias: valco, IcM: https://portal.microsofticm.com/imp/v3/incidents/incident/514742578/summary
* [x] 'Target execution order.' xmakefte question
* [x] https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/10342 - solution: https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/10401
* [x] https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_workitems/edit/2134191/?view=edit - points to https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/10172 (Currently being looked at by @AR-May )
* [x] https://dev.azure.com/devdiv/DevDiv/_workitems/edit/2111557/?view=edit - experimental insertion for this one https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_git/VS/pullrequest/563469?_a=overview - fixed by https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/10409
* [x] OptProf pipeline failing on main: https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_build?definitionId=17389
* [x] CG warning on System.Formats.Asn1 - solution: https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/10396
* [x] QuickBuild breakage: https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/10349 - solution: https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/10394
* [x] VS insertion failing https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_build/results?buildId=9920069&view=logs&j=6b0a400a-0016-5036-8633-3393890eefd7&t=14d00a2b-f93a-50d3-18e2-037fb82d70e0 (Required tests failing on VS build `CSC : error CS2001: Source file 'D:\BrandNames\BrandNames.cs' could not be found. [D:\VS\src\env\TemplateProviders\Package\TemplateProvidersuzwfgs3uwpftmp.csproj]`)
* [x] Pipeline issues - `A secret with (name/id) dotnetfeedmsrc-storage-access-key-1 was not found in this key vault`, then `No pool was specified.` - solutions here: https://teams.microsoft.com/l/message/19:afba3d1545dd45d7b79f34c1821f6055@thread.skype/1721920819331?tenantId=72f988bf-86f1-41af-91ab-2d7cd011db47&groupId=4d73664c-9f2f-450d-82a5-c2f02756606d&parentMessageId=1721920819331&teamName=.NET%20Core%20Eng%20Services%20Partners&channelName=First%20Responders&createdTime=1721920819331
